title: A Singer Takes a Break to Feel Better
summary: Manon Bannerman is a singer in a music group called Katseye. She is taking a short break to focus on her health and feel better. The group has six members and was formed in 2023. They announced that Manon is healthy and taking care of herself. The group supports her decision and will keep performing without her for now. They do not know when she will come back. Manon thanked her fans for their support and said she loves them. The group has faced some hard times, like getting mean messages online, but they stay strong together.
